reference_consumption_description: Referanseforbruk er kjøretøyets forbruk på flat bakke ved 110 km / t. Du kan justere dette slik at det passer deg og kjøretøyet ditt bedre.
fast_charger_description: Ladere som brukes automatisk i planleggingen
charger_arrival_soc_description: Lademargin ved ankomst til lader eller mål
battery_degradation_description: Hvor mye batterikapasitet har blitt dårligere siden batteriet var nytt. En god gjetning er ofte 5%.
time_charge_port_description: Tiden det tar å parkere bilen, strekke, gå ut og koble til laderen, og omvendt når ladingen er fullført
reference_speed_description: Din vedtatte hastighet i forhold til fartsgrensene. 110% betyr 10% raskere enn fartsgrensen osv.
maximum_speed_description: Maksimal hastighet som vi antar at du kjører med. Dette er viktigst på veier med høy fartsgrense eller fri hastighet, f.eks. motorveien.
adjust_speed_description: La ABRP justere hastigheten ned hvis det hjelper å nå målet raskere (for å unngå å lade, for eksempel)
temperature_description: Temperatur utenfor bilen. Dette påvirker forbruket av kjøretøyet.
road_conditions_description: Dette er en enkel modell av effekten av regn eller snø på kjøretøyforbruket
avoid_on_route_description: Unngå følgende ting på den planlagte ruten
extra_weight_description: Antatt ekstra vekt for kjøretøyet, f.eks. hvis du drar en campingvogn eller laster den veldig hardt.
reset_password_description: Vi har nettopp sendt deg en e-post med instruksjoner om hvordan du tilbakestiller passordet ditt.
coming_soon_description: Vi jobber med å legge til denne funksjonen
forgot_email_sent: Det er sendt en e-post med instruksjoner om hvordan du tilbakestiller passordet.
register_email_used: Denne e-postadressen er allerede i bruk
error_one_address: Du kan ikke planlegge uten minst to forskjellige adresser
zoom_level_to_show_chargers: Zoom nivå for å vise ladere
plan_not_found: No working plan could be found. Please check your settings - if the problem remains, you may the button below to report to us.
could_not_calculate_plan: Vi kunne ikke beregne planen din
no_gps_position: Vi kunne ikke finne posisjonen din
link_description: Koble kjøretøyet til livedata for enklere planlegging og oppfølging mens du kjører.
could_not_login: Kunne ikke logge inn - sjekk innloggingsnavn og passord
could_not_link_token: Kunne ikke logge på med token - sørg for at det er et riktig MyTesla oppdateringstoken
must_be_logged_in: Du må være logget inn med en ABRP-konto for å bruke denne funksjonen.
set_home_work_description: For å angi hjemmeadresse eller jobb, klikk på det blå innstillingsikonet ved siden av en adresse - eller trykk lenge på kartet
share_car_description: Du kan dele din data med en annen ABRP-bruker, slik at de kan se hvor kjøretøyet ditt er eller planlegge med det.
realtime_traffic_description: Use realtime traffic speeds for the first legs of the trip
charger_limited_access: This charger has limited access or function and is not used in automatic planning. Check web page!
about_1: A Better Routeplanner (ABRP) is the world's most respected service to plan, learn and dream about Electric Vehicles - EVs.
about_2: Simply select your vehicle model, enter your destination and hit plan to get a full trip plan including charge stops and trip duration.
about_3: When you are ready to drive it, just go to driving mode and use ABRP as a real-time plan follow-up tool and even navigator, replan as necessary and get continuously updated information about your trip.
about_4: ABRP is developed by Iternio, owned and operated by the ABRP founders. Go to our website to explore our business APIs!
could_not_update_vehicle: We could not update the vehicle
could_not_connect_car: We couldn't connect to your car
charging_final_destination_instructions: Charging at the final destination is not taken into account. Remember that you can change the arrival SoC going to settings and changing 'Destination arrival SoC'
departure_time_destination_instructions: You cannot set a departure time on the final destination
need_to_be_onroute: You need to be on route
confirm_deletion_description: Are you sure that you want to delete this vehicle?
reset_calibration_description: We continuously estimate how your vehicle consumes energy while driving at different speeds. This will reset that estimate to the default consumption model for the car model.
live_data_not_available_description: We cannot yet fetch live data for this car model.
save_new_or_replace: Save as new or replace existing plan?
actual_access_token: MyTesla Access Token - will expire any time
mytesla_poll_description: We will poll your Tesla to see if it is active, but we will never wake it up if it is asleep. At most 24 hours after you use the app, we will reduce polling to a minimum to reduce the risk for vampire drain. This is all to provide you with the best possible service.
select_tesla_description: Select the vehicle you want to get live data from
how_to_treat: How would you like to treat {{network}} chargers?
network_preferences_description: Avoid, prefer or use exclusively some networks
no_network_preferences: You don't have any network preferences. Click a charger on the map or in the plan to change this.
no_saved_drives: There are no saved drives or charges on this day
save_my_activity_description: You'll be able to access your historical drives and charges
reset_ref_consumption_description: Reset the calibrated reference consumption back to the default value
overwrite_car_position_description: Use your device's location instead of the car live data position
add_my_car_description: Add and save your own car
share_historical_data_description: The user will be able to see you past drives and charges
delete_share_description: Are you sure that you want to delete this sharing connection?
automatic_settings_description: Use Live SoC, calibrated reference consumption, weather and traffic.
realtime_weather_description: Use live temperature and weather information.
incorrect_speed_limit_or_map_data: Incorrect speed limit or map data?
address_not_found: One or more addresses could not be found.
address_different_regions: The addresses/waypoints given are in different regions of the world. Please review that you selected the correct locations.
about_classic: Looking for the classic ABRP web service? It has just moved to a new home, http://abetterrouteplanner.com/classic.
cookies_message: By using this site you're accepting that we store your settings and an anonymous ID number in a cookie so that your settings remain until next time you use ABRP.
realtime_chargers_description: Use realtime charger availability and forecast in planning, if available.
migrate_tesla_description: Do you want to save your existing Tesla in the new ABRP version?
crash_message:
Oooops! ABRP crashed, but a report has been sent to the developers and we will fix it as soon as we can.

Please reload the page or kill the app.
no_position_description: We couldn't access your current position. Make sure you allow geolocation permissions or write a specific address.
premium_on_app: To become Premium member please go to the A Better Routeplanner website.
manage_subscriptions_on_app: To manage your subscriptions please go to the A Better Routeplanner website.
suggest_create_an_account: If you create an account you'll be able to save your plans, save you car, and much more.
go_premium_description: The basic ABRP features will always be free. However, you can get many more benefits from the planner by upgrading to Premium for as little as $5/month.
provide_payment_method_description:
You need to provide a payment method within {{count}} days.

You can do it now and you will not be charged untill the end of the free trial.
provide_payment_method_on_app: To provide a payment method please click this banner on the ABRP website.
multiple_vehicles_1: All your vehicles in one account.
multiple_vehicles_2: See them all on the map and easily choose the one that you want to plan with.
my_drives_1: Save all your activity and access it at any time.
my_drives_2: Share historical activities or export them to Excel files
weather_forecast_2: View the predicted winds and temperatures in the plan and see its effect on your trip.
realtime_traffic_1: Use up-to-date traffic data for extra accuracy.
realtime_traffic_2: Take the traffic into account for not only trip duration, but also power usage along the route.
suc_availability_1: Use Supercharger availability in the planning, both in real-time and forecasts based on historical use.
suc_availability_2: Avoid busy superchargers, and include wait times in in the total trip time. Other charge networks coming soon.
sharing_vehicle_data_1: Share your live data with another ABRP user.
sharing_vehicle_data_2: Perfect for shared cars, or sharing the status of your drive with friends or family.
apple_watch_1: Perfect for watching your progress on the go.
apple_watch_2: See your most up-to-date charge or drive status on your watch without having to fiddle with your phone.
share_error: We could not share with that user - the ABRP account may not exist.
premium_new_member: Welcome as a Premium member! If you have not already, have a look below at all the goodies which await you:
calib_ref_cons_confidence_description: The calibration is based what we measure from the car while driving at different conditions. For example, we need a certain amount of low, medium and high speed driving to get a commplete picture of the consumption. The closer the confidence numbers are to 100% the more certain we are of the consumption.
not_on_route: You are not on the route
reset_settings_description: Reset all settings to the default value.
reset_settings_confirm:
Are you sure that you want to reset your settings?

 You will need to log in again.
charging_notifications_description: Get notified when it's 10 and 5 minutes left to continue your trip.
home_notifications_description: Get notified when your car arrives or leaves Home.
work_notifications_description: Get notified when your car arrives or leaves Work.
share_map_app_picker: What app would you like to use?
plan_no_longer_viable: This plan is no longer viable
always_log_description: You have some vehicles with live data. You can activate the 'Save my drives' options to be able to access historical data. You can do that from the car settings page.
url_has_been_copied: The url has been copied to the clipboard
charging_notifications_premium_1: Get notified when there is 10 and 5 minutes left to continue your trip.
geofence_notifications_1: Get notified when your car arrives or leaves certain locations.
geofence_notifications_2: For example, you home and work address.
show_setup_description: Show or hide the cards to re-link your car with A Better Routeplanner
link_mytesla: Do you have a MyTesla Account?
link_mytesla_description: If you do, you can link it so we can fetch live data from your car - it makes planning and driving much smoother.
save_advanced_settings_description: Do you want to keep the changes you made in detailed settings?
you_have_a_valid_payment: You have a valid payment method
thanks_for_subscribing_2: You will need to provide a valid payment method within your trial period. We'll not charge you till the end of the free trial.
thanks_for_subscribing_3: We hope you enjoy your A Better Routeplanner Premium Membership! Thank you for supporting us.
thanks_for_subscribing_1: We are happy that you want to try A BetterRouteplanner Premium membership!
abrp_premium_membership_description:
The basic ABRP features will always be free.
However, you can get many more benefits from the planner by upgrading to Premium!
abrp_subscription_login_2: We will redirect you to ABRP web for login and we will bring you back here as soon as you are done.
abrp_subscription_login_1: Please login with your ABRP account to be able to enable Premium services.
go_to_web_and_login: Go to ABRP web and login
battery_capacity_description: Live Data Capacity of the battery measured directly by the car.  Remove from live data to revert to degradation.
